1:
May Yahweh help you in the day of trouble;\q may the name of the God of Jacob protect you
\q
2:
and send help from the holy place\q to support you from Zion.


\q
3:
May he call to mind all your offerings\q and accept your burnt sacrifice.
\qs Selah\qs*
\q
4:
May he grant you your heart's desire\q and fulfill all your plans.


\q
5:
Then we will rejoice in your victory,\q and, in the name of our God, we will raise banners.
\q May Yahweh grant all your petitions.
\q
6:
Now I know that Yahweh will rescue his anointed one;\q he will answer him from his holy heaven
\q with the strength of his right hand that can rescue him.


\q
7:
Some trust in chariots and others in horses,\q but we call on Yahweh our God.
\q
8:
They will be brought down and fall,\q but we will rise and stand upright!


\q
9: Yahweh, rescue the king;\q help us when we call.
